description: SSOT for module freeze states. Lovable and all AI assistants MUST check this file before modifying any module code. If a module is frozen, changes to its paths are NOT ALLOWED without explicit unfreeze.
freeze_criteria: Spec vorhanden, Audit S1-S6 bestanden, produktionsreife Implementierung

MOD-02.reason: KI Office stabil, Spec + Audit PASS

MOD-04.reason: Immobilien stabil inkl. Zuhause-Integration, Spec + Audit PASS

MOD-07.reason: Finanzierung stabil inkl. Privatkredit, Spec + Audit PASS

MOD-11.reason: FM Gold Standard Referenz-Implementierung, Spec + Audit PASS

MOD-12.reason: Akquise-Manager stabil, 2-Stufen-Architektur + Objekteingang, Spec + Audit PASS

MOD-13.reason: Projekte stabil, Intake + Listing-Distribution, Spec + Audit PASS

MOD-17.reason: Car-Management stabil, Fahrzeugakte + Fahrtenbuch, Spec + Audit PASS
